Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn

Class BasicTurn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Options>
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn.BasicTurn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Turn, Start
Direct Known Subclasses:
AthenaTurn
public class BasicTurn
extends Observable<Options>
implements Turn
Type of Turn to be used after setup is finished

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void endCurrentOperation()
    First: we check if the operation just done is a ChooseOperation: in this way we modify the remaining TurnOperations according to the player's choice; Then handleRemainingOperation is called.
    Operation getCurrentOperation()  
    Player getCurrentPlayer()  
    Options getOptions()  
    protected void handleRemainingOperations()
    If player has done all his turnOperations, we switch turn; If the player has to build but he cannot perform this operation, he looses and he receives the notification from controller.

    • BasicTurn

      public BasicTurn​(GameController gameController, Player firstPlayer, java.util.List<Observer<Options>> observerList)
      Default constructor that set only which game the turn belongs to.Ã¹
      Parameters:
      firstPlayer - player that starts the game
      gameController - instance of the game controller, unique for every game
      observerList - list of turn observers (the players remote views)

    • endCurrentOperation

      public void endCurrentOperation()
      First: we check if the operation just done is a ChooseOperation: in this way we modify the remaining TurnOperations according to the player's choice; Then handleRemainingOperation is called.
      Specified by:
      endCurrentOperation in interface Turn

    • handleRemainingOperations

      protected void handleRemainingOperations()
      If player has done all his turnOperations, we switch turn; If the player has to build but he cannot perform this operation, he looses and he receives the notification from controller. Otherwise we notify the operation the player has to do.

    • getOptions

      public Options getOptions()
      Returns:
      the options the current player has, according to his god's power
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - We put this method in turn and not in gods because we have to handle also athenaTurn. In fact AthenaTurn will override this method checking Athena's Power

    • start

      public void start()
      Specified by:
